extendedInfo.description: Play as the Predator in this official game based on the iconic sci-fi film franchise! Hone your hunting techniques to lethal precision as you earn full membership in the Predators clan by tracking down and eliminating packs of elite human assassins, and defending yourself against even deadlier enemies...Brought to you by Angry Mob Games, the creators of Guerrilla Bob and Muffin Knight!PRESS QUOTES:âThe Predator is just a badass.â â IGN; Editorâs Choice Awardââ¦ all-around excellent human-slaying action.â â Gizmodo; This Weekâs Best Appsââ¦check[s] off all the gory boxes to satisfy even the headiest of cult followers.â â TouchArcadeââ¦good game that makes great use of its licenseâ¦â â 148Apps"Predators is a classic..." - GameRating UKYOU ARE THE PREDATORThese humans are the most dangerous killers on the planetâ¦but itâs not their planet. This planet is a game preserve and they are the prey. Pit your incredible Predator strength, stealth, and alien technology against the killer instincts of the nine deadliest human beings alive; mercenaries, assassins, death-squad soldiers, cartel enforcers, black ops snipers, and moreâ¦ Prove you are the ultimate Predator. Begin the hunt and end their lives.CLAN WARFARENo enemy is more dangerous than your own kind. Defend yourself against 3 powerful and distinct Berserker Predators determined to exterminate your clan. Fend off the dangerous Tracker Predator with his ferocious dogs, the Falconer Predator and his vicious hawks, before facing off against your ultimate nemesis--the Super Black Predator.COLLECT YOUR TROPHIESTake out your targets and claim your trophies â the heads of your human prey â while unlocking new alien technologies and weaponry to complete the hunt. Strike your targets swiftly and silently, separating them from their group and eliminating them one-by-one. ALIEN TECHNOLOGIESUse your Stealth Generator and vanish with chameleon-like transparency, then turn on your Thermal Vision while you pull out the big guns. Use long-range cannons, lethal Smart Discs, Razor Whip, the sadistic Net Gun, and of course your deadly wrist-blade and spears. These nasty blades give new meaning to the phrase, âGet to the chopper!â INTENSE ENVIRONMENTSUse the elements and your surroundings to gain the âupper clawâ in a campaign mode of 31 intense and hostile alien environments ranging from eerie killing grounds to dense jungle. * Xperia PLAY optimized ** NVIDIA Tegra optimized *

reviews.title: Worth the money
reviews.comment: This game is amazing. Great time killer and entertainment. Recomend if u have seen the movie. Also, go try out Alien Vs Predator. Game is awesome and get to play as alien, predator, alien queen and more.
reviews.author: Veyron Bon

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I love this game i wish this was avail on psp 3 , also would be good if they made a movie w the variety of preditors sp cool.
reviews.author: chris hambrick

reviews.title: Pretty decent
reviews.comment: Not a bad game at all. You can unlock different weapons and helmets which is a nice addition, and the arsenal can also be upgraded. The graphics are good and the gameplay is smooth.
reviews.author: Jesse Glore

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Amazing game, worth every penny. Lots to do. Graphics are good as well as the missions. Once you are done with the campaign (31 missions) there are two separate survival modes. Good job devs.
reviews.author: Ryan Hart

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Have downloaded many games and this is a very good one!no lag very smooth decent graphics.the more ya play the more moves an stuff you earn an levels open to play.pretty addictive.definatly worth the purchase price!
reviews.author: Jumper Ut

reviews.title: Predators
reviews.comment: Love it. Now it just needs a version where you play as a xenomorph and hunt the characters from aliens.
reviews.author: Joshun Gidda

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Great game!  Very well made game.  Controls are excellent and there\'s lots of constant action.  Easily worth the money!
reviews.author: Matt Ambrose

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s 2x
reviews.comment: It\'s like an early version of alien vs predator evolution. Great weapons and upgrades , it has only one level limited in visual scope but the combat is really unique and great.  If it had more environments it would be five star . Definitely pick it up if you\'re a fan!
reviews.author: Claude D

reviews.title: Crystal Skull- Predator\'s trophy
reviews.comment: I enjoy every moment this game offers. The weapons, masks and trophy all look fantastic! A Predator Fan dream come true.
reviews.author: Sam Wang

reviews.title: Glitchy
reviews.comment: Controls are sooooooo glitchy. Try to attack, and it switches weapons. Character randomly stops moving, and will not move. Lost many times due to this. Please fix. Update: predator hunts are impossible! Tracker spams dogs at you and you can\'t hit him because his dogs are in the way. The whole time, your losing health. You can\'t target him with ranged weapons, but ranged is the best way to kill dogs... all my weapons are level 3, and I have the tracker mask. Impossible.
reviews.author: Mike Distenfeld

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Great game I would like to try avp. Great graphics
reviews.author: Eduardo Valeriano

reviews.title: Moga
reviews.comment: Needs moga support. When are we getting moga support? ALL GOOD GAMES DESERVE MOGA SUPPORT ESPECIALLY SINCE WERE PAYING CUSTOMERS.
reviews.author: Tung-Jih Hour

reviews.title: Great time killer
reviews.comment: You can unlock a mixture of upgradeable weapons and helmets, having a bit of  difficulty on the super black predator. worth every penny if you could put some more levels on that would be awsome.  thanks
reviews.author: Daved Baylis

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.comment: Greastest game i have played theres no other better game i can think apart from game predators
reviews.author: Brandon Difford

reviews.title: sucks ,freeze freeze freeze
reviews.comment: sucks game ,freeze freeze freeze ...screen auto enlarge ,can\'t even see the control key. beyond repair ...don\'t waste your money ...
reviews.author: Bp Lee

reviews.title: Needs more levels!
reviews.comment: I\'m on the last level and once I finished it was boring... avp evolution was good but it also needs more levels... please add then you can get your 5 stars. Make another avp please. That would be cool. Call it avp resurrection or reborn. Etc. Thanks.
reviews.author: K Chery

reviews.title: Reasonable
reviews.comment: I was initially pleased with this game but soon found myself looking for something else to play. The graphics are fairly decent and you can unlock moves as you progress. But the gameplay is repetitive and didn\'t draw me in.
reviews.author: Seanpaul Chambers

reviews.title: Control
reviews.comment: The joy stick needs to be a little bit bigger, or at least the sensor for it. It is not easy to maneuver your character. {4/5 stars}   Level 28 is not easy at all. I have finally beat that level and have no desire to go back. Maybe when I get Mr. Black\'s helmet I will go through the game again.  $~ [Open up the survival mode for 10k honor points as soon as you can; its worth it.] ~$$$$$
reviews.author: joe butler
